#summary HOWTO install the class libraries.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The class libraries contains the implementations of the message objects and convenience classes to provide transformations and reporting. This page shows how to install this module.


= Details =

There are two methods of installation:

* Via Setup Wizard
* File Copy

= Setup Wizard install =

Download the Setup_CoreClassesVVVV.zip (VVVV = version number) archive and 


= File Copy install =



The only thing that you have to make sure of in both cases is that all assembly files (.dll) of this module MUST be located on the same directory.
